summary: The dogs of the world should be valued companions, but with their incessant barking, no one wants one! Now that doesn't have to be the case. This mod removes the barking from all the companion dogs in vanilla Skyrim. It doesn't just turn them down or mute them, it removes the need for them to bark at all!
descriptionHtml:
Main: 
The dogs of the world should be valued companions, but with their incessant barking, no one wants one! Now that doesn't have to be the case. This mod removes the barking from all the companion dogs in vanilla Skyrim. It doesn't just turn them down or mute them, it removes the need for them to bark at all! 

Note: 
There are a couple of new dogs to Dawnguard. This mod may or may not effect them. I will have to test them more in the future. 

Update: 
v1.0: Release - Removed the need for all companion dogs to bark. Should be compatible with almost any other mod.
author: Degrelescence
